results.title: Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy.
results.text_hl: The @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ was then referred to the department of cardiology because of @<m>DISEASE_Systolic_Murmurs</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054160 @@@systolic murmur@@@, @DISEASE_Brugada_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D053840 @@@ECG abnormality@@@, and red cell fragmentation.

citations.NLM: Kubo T, Kitaoka H, Terauchi Y, Tamura S, Okawa M, Yamasaki N, Yabe T, Doi YL. Hemolytic anemia in a patient with hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy. J Cardiol. 2010 Jan;55(1):125-9. PMID: 20122559

results.title: Salmonella typhimurium Endocarditis and Myocarditis in a Cat
results.text_hl: Physical examination revealed a loud left parasternal @<m>DISEASE_Systolic_Murmurs</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054160 @@@systolic murmur@@@ with no thrill.

citations.NLM: Vercelli A, Lo Cicero E, Pazzini L.  Salmonella typhimurium Endocarditis and Myocarditis in a Cat Case Rep Vet Med. 2019;2019():7390530. PMID: 31886018
